H0.text: Which year saw the assassination of US President James Garfield. 1879

H1.text: Which year saw the assassination of US President James Garfield. 1880

H2.text: Which year saw the assassination of US President James Garfield. 1882

H3.text: Which year saw the assassination of US President James Garfield. 1881

A4.text: On July 2, 1881, Garfield was shot by Charles J. Guiteau, a deluded office seeker.

A5.text: He died on September 19 due to infection caused by his doctors' unsanitary methods in treating the wound.
